selected_quotes: New paper with Roice Nelson, Visualizing Hyperbolic Honeycombs.
Updated version of my paper with Roice Nelson on the arXiv, to appear in the Journal of Mathematics and the Arts.
Hyperbolic Catacombs from Visualizing Hyperbolic Honeycombs by @henryseg Via
Roice Nelson made a spherical video Hyperbolic Catacombs Carousel, based on our paper
What software do you use for making these pics?

video.title: {4,3,∞} domains
video.summary:
This is one way to picture the simplex domains of the {4,3,∞} reflection group.  To understand the meaning of {4,3,∞}, see the paper "Visualizing Hyperbolic Honeycombs".

https://arxiv.org/abs/1511.02851
